name: Maryam Usman
bio: Maryam Usman is a Behavioral Health Specialist dedicated to building healthier thinking cultures in communities. Her work focuses on emotional literacy, stress resilience, and the integration of behavioral insights into public health education. As part of the Consultancy Firmâ€™s wellness branch, she designs programs that connect self-awareness with social well-being, empowering people to sustain long-term mental balance.

cards.title: Focus Areas
cards.content: Behavioral Therapy Education, Emotional Intelligence Training, and Preventive Mental Health Programs.

cards.title: Community Work
cards.content: Leads workshops on family communication and self-regulation strategies. Coordinates youth wellness ambassadors across Northern Nigeria.

cards.title: Vision
cards.content: To establish a mental health literacy network that promotes psychological safety and evidence-based wellness culture across Nigeria.
